did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: This collection consists of four final drafts and fourteen published texts of speeches. The collection also includes two books.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward M. Glick Collection, Collection #3070, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mr. Glick in May, 1997.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Mr. Glick bought property in the Stanely area of Page County in 1960. After he retired there in the 1970s, he wrote editorial columns for Harrisonburg's newspaper, the Daily News Record.
